list.abs: nowadays of Founder beautiful and jotter of series family expenses come out , make the life that family expenses jotter walked into us with lightsome footstep .如今方正佳和系列家用笔记本的问世，使得家用笔记本以轻盈的脚步走进了我们的生活。
acme aestheticism , lightsome feeling , work wear also great for , the chest of a hook flower is really beautiful .极致唯美，轻盈的感觉，上班穿也非常适合，胸前的钩花实在是太美丽了。
lightsome pace urge me to run .轻盈地步伐催我奔跑。
facade adopts mainly and heavy stone , matched with lightsome glass curtain wall and Al-alloy windows , decorative thread , the design is simple but solemn .立面以厚重的石材为主，配以轻盈的玻璃幕墙和铝合金窗，辅以装饰线条，庄重简洁大方。

means.word_mean: 1. the cheerful feeling you have when nothing is troubling you
2. the gracefulness of a person or animal that is quick and nimble
3. the trait of being lighthearted and frivolous
